DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to compare the efficacy and safety of BRL49653C versus pioglitazone and placebo.
DOC.brief_title: BRL49653C In Type 2 Diabetes -Comparison Study With Pioglitazone And Placebo By Monotherapy-
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus. Managed by diet therapy. Must have adequate blood, liver and kidney function. Exclusion criteria: Serious cardiovascular disease or serious hepatic disease.
